articles.content:
Vermilion Countys pandemic death toll is now at 34 after health Administrator Doug Toole announced four new fatalities late Tuesday afternoon.

articles.author: Vishwadha Chander
articles.title: Plasma from recovered patients shows little benefit in those hospitalized with COVID-19: study - Reuters
articles.description: Using blood plasma from COVID-19 survivors to treat patients with severe pneumonia caused by the novel coronavirus showed little benefit, according to data released on Tuesday from a clinical trial in Argentina.
